org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

类 HBackupFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.HBackupFileSystem

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public final class HBackupFileSystem
extends Object
    View to an on-disk Backup Image FileSytem Provides the set of methods necessary to interact with the on-disk Backup Image data.

    • 字段概要

      static String getTableBackupDir(String backupRootDir, String backupId, TableName tableName)
      Given the backup root dir, backup id and the table name, return the backup image location, which is also where the backup manifest file is. return value look like: "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup/backup_1396650096738/default/t1_dn/", where "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup" is a backup root directory
      static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getTableBackupPath(TableName tableName, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path backupRootPath, String backupId)
      Given the backup root dir, backup id and the table name, return the backup image location, which is also where the backup manifest file is. return value look like: "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup/backup_1396650096738/default/t1_dn/", where "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup" is a backup root directory

    • 方法详细资料

      • getTableBackupDir

        public static String getTableBackupDir(String backupRootDir,
                                       String backupId,
                                       TableName tableName)
        Given the backup root dir, backup id and the table name, return the backup image location, which is also where the backup manifest file is. return value look like: "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup/backup_1396650096738/default/t1_dn/", where "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup" is a backup root directory
        参数:
        backupRootDir - backup root directory
        backupId - backup id
        tableName - table name
        返回:
        backupPath String for the particular table

      • getBackupTmpDirPath

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getBackupTmpDirPath(String backupRootDir)
        Get backup temporary directory
        参数:
        backupRootDir - backup root
        返回:
        backup tmp directory path

      • getBackupTmpDirPathForBackupId

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getBackupTmpDirPathForBackupId(String backupRoot,
                                                                       String backupId)
        Get backup tmp directory for backupId
        参数:
        backupRoot - backup root
        backupId - backup id
        返回:
        backup tmp directory path

      • getTableBackupDataDir

        public static String getTableBackupDataDir(String backupRootDir,
                                           String backupId,
                                           TableName tableName)

      • getBackupPath

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getBackupPath(String backupRootDir,
                                                      String backupId)

      • getTableBackupPath

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getTableBackupPath(TableName tableName,
                                                           org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path backupRootPath,
                                                           String backupId)
        Given the backup root dir, backup id and the table name, return the backup image location, which is also where the backup manifest file is. return value look like: "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup/backup_1396650096738/default/t1_dn/", where "hdfs://backup.hbase.org:9000/user/biadmin/backup" is a backup root directory
        参数:
        backupRootPath - backup root path
        tableName - table name
        backupId - backup Id
        返回:
        backupPath for the particular table

      • getLogBackupDir

        public static String getLogBackupDir(String backupRootDir,
                                     String backupId)
        Given the backup root dir and the backup id, return the log file location for an incremental backup.
        参数:
        backupRootDir - backup root directory
        backupId - backup id
        返回:
        logBackupDir: ".../user/biadmin/backup/WALs/backup_1396650096738"

      • getLogBackupPath

        public static org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path getLogBackupPath(String backupRootDir,
                                                         String backupId)

                                                         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path backupRootPath,
                                                         String backupId)
                                                  throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

                                         org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path backupRootPath,
                                         String backupId)
                                  throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException

      • checkImageManifestExist

        public static void checkImageManifestExist(HashMap<TableName,BackupManifest> backupManifestMap,
                                           TableName[] tableArray,
                                           org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                           org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path backupRootPath,
                                           String backupId)
                                    throws IOException
        Check whether the backup image path and there is manifest file in the path.
        参数:
        backupManifestMap - If all the manifests are found, then they are put into this map
        tableArray - the tables involved
        抛出:
        IOException - exception
